record.title: MORNING BUSINESS
record.chair: Under the previous order, there will now be a period for the transaction of morning business for up to 60 minutes, with Senators permitted to speak for up to 10 minutes each, with the first half of the time under the control of the Republicans and the second half of the time under the control of the majority.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that I be allowed to speak for up to 15 minutes.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
